content: the beautiful gradient on the wings of these butterflies is achieved by using a self-striping yarn but you can easily customize your butterfly s wings in any combination of colours you can dream up these butterflies would work great as wall accents in a little one s bedroom or nursery as a mobile with a smaller weight yarn and gauge a throw pillow on a little one s bed with heavier weight yarn and gauge as a rattle or simply to play with click through to the blog for all the details
